name: Motocross
overview: Published in RUN 1988/11 (Issue #59) and in Radio Elettronica & Computer 1989/11. Racing a motocross motorcycle requires courage, skill and quick reactions. While courage is not necessary for playing C-64 Motocross, the skill and Quick reactions are. By pressing the C (lefl) and M (right) keys, you are scored on your ability to guide a motorcycle between markers on a narrow, unpredictable, computer-generated race course. Motocrossers. start your computers!
